body: So the trouble is actually not in the `{% raw %}` tag, but in the code that's inside the code block, because Jekyll tried to process it after the deploy to `gh-pages`? In that case adding [`.nojekyll`](https://blog.github.com/2009-12-29-bypassing-jekyll-on-github-pages/) should disable it. As we do not use Jekyll, we may want to disable it for all repos so the problem won't reappear in the future.
